title: Exploring the asymmetric relationship between natural resources, fintech, remittance and environmental pollution for BRICS nations: New insights from MMQR approach
content:
Publication date: March 2024

Source: Resources Policy, Volume 90

Author(s): Zhang Kai, Mohamed Sharaf, Siao-Yun Wei, Ata Al Shraah, Luan Thanh Le, Dr Abhay Arvind Bedekar, Ahmad Y.A. Bani Ahmad
